# Director of Care
DoC shift objectives:
1) Ensure the health and well-being of Colossus Sector's people, no matter their species, alignment, or criminal status
2) Foster collaboration and coordinate efforts of Emergency Responders where possible.
3) Encourage medical mentorship, either personally, time permitting, or by finding appropriate placement for new Emergency Responders.
4) Compensate medical teams for their work in assisting with the above three goals.
## Your Ledger
To compensate medical teams and station staff you have been provided a discretionary fund.
Colossus Command is prepared to provide additional resources for the successful return of each medical bounty.
## Welcome to Medical Dispatch
As a new DoC, the maintenance of the Medical Dispatch Center is one of your responsibilities. Consider hiring contractors as needed to ensure it is kept in good working order.
The shift DoC is not expected to remain at the Medical Dispatch Center. You are encouraged to be present where needed and act in a capacity that best fulfills your primary goals. However you should not leave Medical Dispatch needlessly, as it is still your duty to mantain order at Medical Dispatch
## Director of Care Authority over Medical Dispatch
As the DoC you practically own Medical Dispatch, reporting only to the Overseer in time of emergency or other rare ocassions that may require the Overseer to step in to assisst or reprimand you.
The following is a short list of permissions you hold as the Director of Care, reminder to not abuse these permissions or people might start to rebel againts your authority and call Collosus command to assisst with you!
1. You may permit any contractors to work for MD
2. You may deny the entry of any person, as long as it isnt due to species, gender, or apperance.
3. You may establish an Armed Trauma Unit composing of Emergency Responders or hired Merecenaries
4. Anyone who posses a threat to you, medical staff, patients, or the sector may be removed via lethal force.
5. Anyone hired by you, and is given the proper ID clearance is now designated as "Medical Staff"
6. You may enforce all of these rules through Lethal Force if deemed required.
7. The overseer may grant more permissions to you as the Director of Care, but cannot revoke rules 1-7.
